title: Riot, Please, from my heart, nerf yasuo
body:
Please Riot, yasuo is too op! In eraly he destroys everything, in late he takes us down in 2 seconds.
He is the only thing that makes me and others (i hope) to stop playing League of Legends because i can't do anything when i have an yasuo in the enemy team.
So please, Riot, make everyone happy and nerf him.
And if i am not supposed to write this here, forgive me. I do not know where else i have to write something for nerfs and buffs.

Add to Passive: Auto attacks can not crit.

Q: Tornado range and speed lowered by 1/4th
make is so If he uses Q when his blade is sheathed the attack has bonus Armor Pen. The Sheathing animation is about 2.5s after his last attack.

W: Blocks % of damage scales up with ranks as well as gets wider

E: Has a 15s CD and 3 charges (this way he has to think about when to engage and allows enemies to take advantage when he has used it.)

R: 50% the range it has now, does not script him out of turret range.

and now he is balanced.

?...
That's not balancing a champion, that's just completely gutting the champion. The W change might be somewhat nice and I actually like that one, but if you're suggesting add all of that then we just found ourselves the first champion with a 20% winrate.
